message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase my product. I believe it will be incredibly valuable to you.  I'm initially proposing a price of $1,200,000.  This is a unique product with immense potential.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the proposed price. I am willing to pay up to $950,000 for the product. I hope this revised offer aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  I understand your budget constraints, however,  the value of this product is significant and I can't let it go for that low. Would you consider $1,100,000? I'm confident this would be a wise investment on your end.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. While I respect the value of the product, I must stick to my budget. I am willing to pay up to $1,000,000 for the product. I hope this revised offer meets your needs.
